translation.en: Yo, bro.
- What's happening, bruv? - How much you got there?
translation.ja: 調子は？ いくらある？

translation.en: (Boy) Yeah, sweet.
Look how they get to the top.
(Boy) Shit.
Oh, come on.
- Yo. - (Tareek) Yo, where are you?
Something's about to kick off. You might need to get back here quick.
translation.ja: 何かおっ始まる　戻れ

translation.en: It's Kamale, man! Come! Come! Fuck!
translation.ja: ついて来い　早くしろ

translation.en: - What the fuck are you doing here, cuz? - Huh? What?
translation.ja: 何しに来たの？ 何だ？

translation.en: - (Slap) - Get out my way, man! Shut your mouth!
translation.ja: 黙って どいてりゃいいんだ

translation.en: Say something.
- (Boy) Yo! - Drive the car, man.
Fuck, man!
- What happened? - That man took everything.
translation.ja: どうした 奪われた

translation.en: - What? - Kamale and them took everything.
- What the fuck you talking about? - They had a gun to my face.
translation.ja: 何だと？ 銃を向けられた

translation.en: - Everything? - Every fucking thing.
translation.ja: 全部 持ってかれた

translation.en: - Fuckin' slapped me in my face, cuz. - So fucking what?
translation.ja: 殴られた だから何だ

translation.en: Yo! Wagwan?
translation.ja: おい　何してたんだ？

translation.en: He was with all of them. I couldn't do nothing by myself, bruv.
translation.ja: 俺１人じゃ何もできねえよ

translation.en: (Boy) This is some joke thing, man.
Mum.
Mum, wake up.
You gonna get out of bed today?
translation.ja: ねえ 今日は起きる？

translation.en: What are you doing? It's too bright! (Tuts)
Do you want me to call a doctor? I can get him to come round.
translation.ja: お医者さんを 呼んでこようか？

translation.en: You should try and eat something.
You need a new colour in here, Mum. It's making you depressed.
translation.ja: 壁を塗り替えたら？ 気分が落ちる色だ

translation.en: I'm going to paint it for you.
(Gem) Ra'Nell.
Ra'Nell, it's Gem.
(Greene) You owe three grand.
Listen, bruv, we didn't lose the food. Kamale come in and took the food.
translation.ja: カマレがフードを取った

translation.en: That's not my problem.
I still gotta tell Bobby that you let Kamale come and take his food away.
translation.ja: ボビーには お前らが渡したと

translation.en: Hold on, Lee, we done warned you about Kamale and them London Fields, man.
translation.ja: ロンドンフィールズの カマレのことは忠告した

translation.en: Dushane, you're not listening. You owe Bobby three grand.
translation.ja: ダシェン　ボビーに 3000ポンドの借りだ

translation.en: How can we owe three grand
when you're the one supposedly running Summerhouse, bruv?
translation.ja: サマーハウスの 仕切りは お前だ

translation.en: Who the fuck are you talking to?
Hey, listen, come on, man. We're going to get your money.
translation.ja: あんたの金は手に入れる

translation.en: - When? - A week.
You're gonna keep Bobby Raikes waiting a week for his paper? Good luck.
translation.ja: ボビーを１週間も 待たせるだと？

translation.en: (Sully) So, why don't you cover us, then?
I'm not picking up your fucking debt, you prick.
Go on, fuck off. I'm eating. Go on, fuck off.
translation.ja: 行け　メシがまずくなる

translation.en: (Sully) I'm sick of that fat fuck, you know.
I'm telling you. We ain't getting nowhere with this guy sitting on top of man like that.
translation.ja: あいつじゃ話になんねえ

translation.en: We need to go and talk to Raikes direct.
Bruv, we can't talk to Raikes direct.
Especially if we ain't got that paper for him.
I don't know who can help man with this, fam.
Femi.
Femi.
A lot of the boys, they don't do cards no more.
Some of them even had to get jobs.
It's that chip and PIN, man - it's made it hard for all of us.
translation.ja: ＩＣチップのせいさ 複製できん

translation.en: Even the postman. Used to be that thing you could get a postman easy,
translation.ja: カードを盗み出すこと自体が 大変だ

translation.en: but now they're all scared. They check up on them now.
translation.ja: 今は皆 慎重でダメだ

translation.en: What are you saying? I need this real quick, bruv.
translation.ja: こっちは急いでるんだ

translation.en: I will talk to my postman.
- Why don't you do that, then? - (Man) Femi!
That didn't sound too positive.
- He'll come through. - Fucking hope so, mate.
translation.ja: 大丈夫さ 希望はあるか

translation.en: Nice piece of yam that is, darling.
Here, let me weigh it for you.
Yeah?
You OK?
You want anything else?
translation.ja: これで全部かい？ 77ポンド30ペンス

translation.en: Seven pounds, thirty pence. Here, take it, darling.
translation.ja: これで全部かい？ 77ポンド30ペンス 買わないのか？

translation.en: Take it. Pay me next time, yeah?
translation.ja: 持っていきな ツケでいい

translation.en: - (Muttering) - Here.
Stop it. Stop looking at me.
translation.ja: やめて 私を見ないで 見ないでって言ってるの

translation.en: (Muttering)
translation.ja: 私を見ないで 見ないでって言ってるの

translation.en: Stop it.
- (Pigeon fluttering) - Don't look at me.
(Echoing) Are you OK? Can I help you?
translation.ja: 大丈夫ですか？　手伝います

translation.en: (Girl) Oh, my gosh!
(Woman) Do you have a history of mental illness, Lisa?
translation.ja: リサ　精神科の病歴は？

translation.en: OK, we think the best thing would be for you to come in.
translation.ja: まあ いいわ 入院が１番だと思う

translation.en: Is there anyone at home? A husband or a partner?
translation.ja: お宅に旦那さんか 恋人はいない？

translation.en: Do you have any children?
Lisa?
Because, obviously, if you did, we'll need to see about their care.
I ain't got no children.
It's Precious again, man. She keeps on texting me.
translation.ja: プレシャスからメールだ

translation.en: (Ra'Nell) You're a liar!
Hey, Dushane. Wagwan for my man Ra'Nell?
translation.ja: ダシェン　弟分のラネルだ

translation.en: - Who is he? - Ra'Nell Smith, man. Don't you remember?
translation.ja: 誰だと？ ラネル 去年 親父を刺した

translation.en: - Shanked up his dad last year. - That's Wayne Smith's kid?
translation.ja: 去年 親父を刺した ウェインを？

translation.en: Yeah, cuz.
Yo! Wagwan, blood.
- Wagwan. - You know who I am, innit?
translation.ja: こんちは 俺は誰だ？

translation.en: Everyone knows you, Dushane.
Come here.
I want to ask you something.
Ain't it time you started rolling with us?
translation.ja: そろそろ仕事しねえか

translation.en: - I can't do that. My mum wouldn't like it. - (Kisses teeth) Oh, Lord.
Look, hold that.
What's wrong with you? (Laughs)
- You don't want the money? - All right, all right.
translation.ja: なら俺が おいおい

translation.en: You know what, it's cool. Cool.
Listen, anyone bullying you, disrespecking you, you let me know, yeah?
translation.ja: 脅されたりナメられたら すぐ言え

translation.en: I'll sort that out for you.
Smart youth.
Bruv, what's wrong with you? Whenever someone offers you money, you take it.
translation.ja: 何やってんだ くれる金はもらえ

translation.en: Especially when it's someone like Dushane.
That's you, not me, innit?
(Ra'Nell) Mum. Mum!
translation.ja: ママ　どこにいるの？

translation.en: Mum!
I don't smell no jerk chicken, bruv.
She's not even here, bruv.
Stop.
You all right?
You wanna go down the chippy and get something to eat?
translation.ja: フィッシュ･アンド･チップス 食いに行くか？

translation.en: No, man. I'm gonna wait for my mum. You go, innit.
translation.ja: いや　ママを待つ お前は行けよ

translation.en: No, it's cool, I'll wait with you.
Gem.
Gem, wake up.
Gem, you should go home, man.
- See you in the morning. - See you in the morning.
translation.ja: また明日 ああ またな

translation.en: Hello, Mum, it's me. Where are you and when are you coming home?
translation.ja: ママ 今どこ？ 何時に帰ってくる？

translation.en: Yo, brother.
It's a good address. Swiss Cottage.
translation.ja: スイス宛で 限度額は5000ポンド

translation.en: £5,000 on there. PIN, code 10, everything.
translation.ja: スイス宛で 限度額は5000ポンド 暗証番号も分かった

translation.en: - That's cool. - You have something for me, huh? - I will have. - (Chuckles) What?
Bruv, give me three days, I'll get that for you.
Listen, are you trying to boy me off? I've already paid my postman.
Yo, yo, yo. What the fuck's your problem, blood?
We ain't taking no risks. It's man that's putting in the work out here.
translation.ja: 問題ねえ 考えてることがある

translation.en: - Three days, fam. - I want my money, Dushane.
- It's free money, man. Chill out. - Fuck that.
translation.ja: 安心しろ 安心なんかできるか

translation.en: Fucking ponce.
- (Leon) All right, Kerry? - Hiya. I'm fine. How are you?
translation.ja: ケリー 私は元気よ

translation.en: (Leon) Anything I need to know for today?
Erm... Nope. It's all exactly the same as yesterday.
translation.ja: 別に昨日と変わらない

translation.en: (Leon) Cool.
Lisa?
Lisa.
Lisa, it's Leon.
When did you come in here, Lise?
Lisa, how long you been in here?
Someone looking after Ra'Nell?
Is someone looking after Ra'Nell?
Lisa.
(Ra'Nell) What you doing, man?
We're gonna need brushes, innit?
You know what, fam, I can't even afford this.
Shit, they're taking the piss.
(Woman) Ra'Nell?
translation.ja: ラネル？　こんにちは

translation.en: - Hello, Ra'Nell! - Oh, you all right, Heather?
translation.ja: ラネル？　こんにちは ヘザー

translation.en: - You all right? - Mm- hm.
- What you doing? - Painting my mum's room.
translation.ja: 今 何を？ ペンキを

translation.en: - What colour? - Loyal wheat.
That's nice.
Are you pregnant or just fat?
translation.ja: 妊娠中？　デブなだけ？

translation.en: Hey, shut up, man.
Seven months. Only another two to go.
- Have you done the scan? - Listen to you,
translation.ja: エコーは？ 聞いてどうするの？

translation.en: talking about scans and stuff.
What do you need all them lights for?
I'm doing up a flat and there's not much natural light in there.
translation.ja: アパートは自然光がなくて

translation.en: Be well bright with all of them.
Yeah. I'm guessing it will be.
- You boys got five minutes? - Yeah.
Come on, you can help me put this stuff in the car.
Here, take that.
translation.ja: はい　これ取っといて

translation.en: No, you're all right.
- Go on, take it. - Thank you.
- What you doing? - Oh, he's all right. You deserve it.
translation.ja: よせよ いいじゃない　お駄賃よ

translation.en: Thank you, boys.
- Say hello to your mum for me. - Yeah, I will.
translation.ja: ママに よろしく うん

translation.en: - She's a MILF. - Shut up, man.
What? So, you're telling me you wouldn't bang that, nah?
translation.ja: お前はヤリたくないか？

translation.en: (Man) Yeah.
Flat this big, you get a very good crop. Very good crop.
translation.ja: この広さなら いいものが取れるよ

translation.en: What's the matter? Don't... Don't worry.
You don't have to do nothing. I take care of everything.
translation.ja: 何もしなくても 私が全部やる

translation.en: Cool.
It's Ra'Nell, right? Do you remember me?
translation.ja: ラネル　覚えてるか？

translation.en: You're a friend of my dad's.
I was a friend of your dad's. I ain't seen Wayne in a long time.
translation.ja: だが しばらく会ってない

translation.en: (Ra'Nell) How do I know you're not lying?
You don't. You just have to trust me.
- Listen, I'm here about your mum. - What about my mum?
She's OK, but she's in hospital.
What do you mean, she's in hospital?
Don't worry. She's not physically sick or nothing.
She just needs time to rest.
She'll be all right. I brought you some jerk chicken.
You better save me some, you know.
I'm guessing you don't wanna stay with your dad?
No. I don't even know where the fuck he is.
translation.ja: イヤだ 居場所も知りたくない

translation.en: Thing is, if you ain't got no one to stay with, no family or nothing,
translation.ja: 同居の家族がいないと― 子供は施設に入る

translation.en: they're gonna put you into care.
That's why your mum never said anything to the doctors about you.
translation.ja: だからママは君を秘密に

translation.en: I'm not going into care. I can look after myself.
But she might not be back for a while.
I said I ain't going into care!
OK. This is what we're gonna do.
translation.ja: 分かった こうしよう

translation.en: You're gonna stay here, but under my terms, yeah?
translation.ja: 家にいてもいいが 俺の指示に従え

translation.en: Right, you go to school every day.
You keep yourself and this place clean for your mum.
translation.ja: ママのため家を掃除しておけ

translation.en: No hanging out on the estate, and you go to your bed at night, early.
translation.ja: フラフラしてないで 夜は早く寝ること

translation.en: That's the deal.
- Can you cook? - A bit.
OK. I can bring you some stuff you can heat up.
When do I get to visit her?
That's gonna be tricky,
cos if the doctors see you, they put two and two together and...
translation.ja: 医者が 君ら親子を見たら…

translation.en: I'll see what I can do.
If I write a note, would you give it to her?
Yeah, course.
Now eat up.
(Lee) What the fuck's he doing here?
- Who's that, Lee? - Fuck. Soldier out of Summerhouse.
translation.ja: リー　誰だ？ サマーハウスのチンピラ

translation.en: - Is he the one that lost that bit of grub? - Yeah, that's the cunt.
translation.ja: フードを奪われた？ そいつだ

translation.en: You've got a fucking cheek, in't ya? What you doing?
- Came to give Bobby his paper. - Give me the fucking money.
translation.ja: ボビーに金を よこせ

translation.en: I wanna give it to him personally.
Give me the fucking paper. Go on, go on, gimme.
translation.ja: いいから早く渡せって

translation.en: I think Bobby wants to see me.
Fuck you, you cunt.
(Raikes) Sit down.
What's your name, kid?
Dushane.
- You got some paperwork for me? - Yeah.
- It don't wanna be shy. - It's all there, man.
You got two minutes.
Let me ask you a question, yeah?
Why we gotta make it so hard for the customers?
Feds know people are buying and selling in Hackney, right?
translation.ja: ハックニーで 売買してても―

translation.en: Now as long as we don't make no noise, they don't really care.
translation.ja: 大人しくしてりゃ パクられない

translation.en: It's part of the fabric of life, innit?
Fabric of life? Look, this is all very interesting, but...
translation.ja: 社会の仕組みも面白いが…

translation.en: Let me run Summerhouse.
That position's filled. You know that.
I ain't dubbing Lee or nothing, yeah?
But you think Kamale and them London Fields boys
translation.ja: リーが仕切ってて カマレたちに―

translation.en: could come into Summerhouse if he was doing his job right?
I know you and Lee are tight,
but that don't change what happened, man, and it shouldn't have happened.
translation.ja: 起きたことは起きたことだ

translation.en: So, what do you want from me?
Eight ounces of brown to start.
Eight?
I can move that easy.
So, you wanna do business with me, yeah?
- That's right. - Why?
- I want a life. - But you're breathing, ain't you?
translation.ja: 儲けたい 十分だろ

translation.en: I want a good life.
I was born and bred in Summerhouse. I'm 26 years old.
translation.ja: サマーハウスに生まれて26年

translation.en: I got nothing else to be except this.
translation.ja: この商売しか知らねえ

translation.en: I was born in Summerhouse.
We gonna do business or what?
(Vincent) Light very important.
Always keep this distance from here.
What about the water?
Water, water is here. Pump is always on.
translation.ja: ここ ポンプは常に動かす

translation.en: - Do you like gardening? - Me? Yeah, I love gardening.
translation.ja: ここ ポンプは常に動かす 庭いじりとは違うわね

translation.en: - It's not like growing tomatoes, is it? - Same thing, but different.
translation.ja: 庭いじりとは違うわね 同じで違う

translation.en: Well, you don't go to prison for growing tomatoes in a window box, do ya?
translation.ja: トマトなら捕まらない

translation.en: Most important thing not to go to prison - smell.
translation.ja: 捕まらないために鼻を使う

translation.en: - Smell? - Smell from the plant, very strong.
translation.ja: 草の匂いさ　換気装置だ

translation.en: Extractor. Take away the smell.
translation.ja: 草の匂いさ　換気装置だ 嗅いで

translation.en: - How long's it take to grow a crop? - Thirteen weeks.
Now, when you grow you must always have shiny leaf, dark green.
translation.ja: 葉がピカピカになる 深緑さ　青白いのも黄色も 育て方がダメ

translation.en: Pale no good. Yellow no good. Means you not feed it right.
translation.ja: 深緑さ　青白いのも黄色も 育て方がダメ

translation.en: Every day you check the pH water.
Temperature.
translation.ja: 温度も　常にポンプを

translation.en: Make sure pump is always working. Shiny, shiny leaf, huh?
translation.ja: 温度も　常にポンプを ピカピカの葉っぱ あなたが刈り入れ 私が買う

translation.en: You want, I buy your crop off you.
translation.ja: ピカピカの葉っぱ あなたが刈り入れ 私が買う

translation.en: - What you gonna give me for it? - I give you good price.
translation.ja: いくら払う？ いい値段で

translation.en: - What price? - Good price.
No, no, Vincent, I need the exact price. I need to have this all worked out.
translation.ja: ビンセント　正確な値段は？

translation.en: Ah, don't worry. I give you good price, all right?
translation.ja: 心配ない　いい値段だから

translation.en: - (Dushane) What's going on? - What's happening? All right?
- What's this? - There's a name in there.
It's got to be this one, the right one.
(Leon) You all right, girl? What you saying?
Ra'Nell put some clothes together for you. And he asked me to give you this.
translation.ja: ラネルが この荷物を それと手紙

translation.en: (Leon) He's a good kid, you know?
translation.ja: 〝愛してる　ラネル〞 いい子だね 〝愛してる　ラネル〞

translation.en: (Chuckles) He's got some fire in his belly. He's all right.
translation.ja: 〝愛してる　ラネル〞 やる気満々だ あの子なら大丈夫 〝愛してる　ラネル〞

translation.en: Listen, Lise.
They've got you on all these drugs to stabilise you, and that's all right for now,
translation.ja: 落ちつくためにドラッグを 今はいいだろう

translation.en: but I've seen too many people stay doped up on these things,
translation.ja: だが やめられない人も

translation.en: and that ain't no way to get better, trust me.
So, when you're feeling up to it, I want you to come to the gym and train.
translation.ja: 気分のいい時に 俺のジムで運動を

translation.en: It'll do you good. And don't worry about Ra'Nell.
translation.ja: それがいい ラネルは心配ない

translation.en: I'll look after him. He'll be all right.
If your mum doesn't come home tonight, are you gonna call someone?
translation.ja: 今夜も戻らなかったら？

translation.en: I don't need to. I already know where she is.
Where?
Come on, tell me.
- They put her in a mental hospital. - No.
translation.ja: 精神科だ マジか　退院は いつ？

translation.en: When's she coming home?
translation.ja: マジか　退院は いつ？

translation.en: I don't know.
Shit.
- She'll be all right though, yeah? - Yeah, hopefully.
translation.ja: 大丈夫だろ？ たぶん

translation.en: Can't even visit her. If they found out about me, they'd put me in care.
translation.ja: 見つかったら 俺は施設入り

translation.en: So don't be telling no one, though.
I won't.
(Gem) Marnie!
(Man) Keep your head still, my bro.
(2nd man) I'm talking.
How am I supposed to talk if I can't move my head?
(Barber) I can talk without moving my head. Watch me. Did you see my head move?
translation.ja: 俺は喋っても動かない ほら見ろ

translation.en: That's cos you're chatting shit, cuz.
My head moves when I talk cos I talk important shit.
translation.ja: 大事な話をすると動くんだ

translation.en: And don't use that as an excuse to fuck up my hair.
You're done.
Nah, nah. I'm not done, fam, look. Symmetry, fam.
translation.ja: いや まだだ 左右対称じゃない

translation.en: Listen, I'm just about to get in the car, innit, so... I'm gonna have to hang up.
translation.ja: 車に乗るから もう切るぜ

translation.en: Bye.
- (Sully) Yo, are you Ross, yeah? - Who's asking?
- (Ross groaning) - (Dushane) Just come on, man.
- Sully, would you hurry up? - (Sully) Fucking hold him down.
translation.ja: 何やってる　押さえつけろ

translation.en: Keep still, man.
(Muffled groaning and screaming)
(Dushane) Yo, fam, just come on, man. What's wrong with you?
(Sully) Fucking hold him down.
- (Snap) - (Muffled groans)
- What? What? - It's the wrong finger.
Bruv, they ain't gonna know the fucking difference.
Course they're gonna know the fucking difference, bruv. Look!
They look the same to me. You crazy?
I'm telling you now, we need to get the right finger.
You're saying you want me to cut the other finger off now?
It's attention to detail, innit? Go on.
translation.ja: 細かいとこまで正確に

translation.en: - You're sick, you know, man? - Come on, bruv.
(Raikes) My sister's kid, 17 years old, got a glass eye,
all because this got poked in his face.
translation.ja: まさに これが 突いたせいでな

translation.en: Now a situation has become vacant. My mate here, Lee...
translation.ja: 人材募集がある このリーが昇進した

translation.en: well, he's moving up.
Congratulations.
translation.ja: おめでとう 俺とお前ら２人とで ビジネスを

translation.en: So that means that you two and me are gonna do business together,
translation.ja: 俺とお前ら２人とで ビジネスを

translation.en: but we're gonna do business exactly how I say.
Because what this is is a special relationship. I'm trusting you with my food.
translation.ja: 特別な関係だぞ フードを預けても大丈夫か？

translation.en: You can trust us.
I know that I can trust you
because I know who your family are.
Give 'em the parcel.
Bring me the paper in a week.
What about Kamale?
What about him?
translation.ja: 今や お前らが サマーハウスの仕切りだ

translation.en: You boys are running Summerhouse now. Whatever you feel to do, fine by me.
translation.ja: 今や お前らが サマーハウスの仕切りだ どうとでも好きにやれ

translation.en: What you saying, cuz?
No, chill, man. Jam.
I just come to tell you we're running Summerhouse now, ya hear me?
So all them little stunts you pulled before,
translation.ja: この前 人のフードを 奪ったな

translation.en: coming in and taking man's food and all that, can't happen again. Understand?
translation.ja: この前 人のフードを 奪ったな 二度と許さねえ

translation.en: So what about Lee Greene?
Don't worry about Lee Greene. He's moved on.
- (Dushane) What ya doing, man? - (Slash)
Stay the fuck out of Summerhouse, ya listening?
translation.ja: サマーハウスから手を引け

translation.en: What you do that for?
If you know me, I don't come nowhere just to talk, blood. Anyway, I saw his face. He weren't even listening to you. (Snorts)
translation.ja: 話しに来たわけじゃねえし 言っても聞かねえよ

translation.en: You know what you started now, innit?
He already started it.
Two, yeah? All right, holler, innit.
(Chatter)
Nobody move!
(People groaning and laughing)
(Dushane) Listen, we've got this place in Finchley, it's all set up. Ready to go.
translation.ja: フィンチリーに行けば分かる

translation.en: (Raikes) Going country. That's full on, that's 24/7.
You sure your youngsters can handle that sort of pressure?
They know what they have to do.
How much do you want?
Box of each.
(Raikes) That's a lot of money.
You better know what you're doing.
(Men chatting quietly, chuckling)
Oi! Come, man, let me talk to you quickly.
translation.ja: こっちに来い 話がある

translation.en: See Dris, Chantelle. They're making mad paper, you know?
translation.ja: あのドリスとシャンテルは 金を貯めてる

translation.en: Even little Michael, 10 years old. Making his money.
translation.ja: 10歳のマイケルだって 稼いでる

translation.en: What are you lot saying? Wanna make some paper?
- Yeah, I do. - What about you, Ra'Nell?
Look, bruv, I know your mum's in the Hackney nuthouse, you know.
translation.ja: お袋はハックニーの 病院だって？

translation.en: (Gem) Bruv, I didn't say nothing. I swear.
(Chuckling) Don't worry, bruv, this is Summerhouse, word gets around.
translation.ja: サマーハウスじゃ すぐ話が広まる 普通だ

translation.en: Look, I know how it is with family and that. You get me?
I know your daddy ain't around, but we are.
translation.ja: 親父がいなくても俺らがいる

translation.en: When your mum comes out, it's you that has to step up for her like a man, you know. Got to take care of her and all that.
translation.ja: お袋が退院したら お前が男として支えるんだ

translation.en: Listen, we're your family now.
translation.ja: 俺たちは もうファミリーだ

translation.en: Right, think of all these lot as your cousins, you get me?
I'm gonna look out for you, fam. Don't worry.
(Sully) Hey, what. I'm gonna pick you lot up, innit.
translation.ja: お前らも誘ってやるからよ

translation.en: - When? - When you see me, that's when it is.
translation.ja: いつ？ 今度 会う時

translation.en: Fucking when, man, when. Just be ready.
translation.ja: バカだな 準備して待ってろ

translation.en: Bruv, we're gonna be rich.
(Sighs) Fuck!
(Sully) Do you know how gay you look?
Bruv, shut the fuck up. You know how fucking skinny you look, huh?
translation.ja: 黙れ そんなガリガリのくせに

translation.en: - Prick. - (Dushane) You think I'm joking?
translation.ja: うるせえ マジだぜ 襲われたら どうする

translation.en: How you gonna defend yourself on the roads with them fucking skinny arms?
translation.ja: マジだぜ 襲われたら どうする

translation.en: (Sully) It's why I've got a knife. So I don't have to do none of this gay shit.
translation.ja: 俺にはナイフがあるから 平気さ

translation.en: - What you saying, Shane? - Hey, what you saying, man?
Dushane, I need to ask you a favour, man.
Go on. What is it?
I'd really appreciate it if you left Ra'Nell Smith alone.
What's Ra'Nell Smith got to do with you?
His mum's a good friend of mine.
So what, bruv? Still ain't got nothing to do with you.
Like, this is our thing.
If we wanna talk to someone, we're gonna talk to them.
I'm sorta looking after him while his mum's in hospital.
I promised her I'd keep him out of trouble.
Didn't you just hear what he said?
Think about it, yeah? Plenty other kids out there, man.
translation.ja: 町には他にも子供が大勢いる

translation.en: (Sully) Hope you ain't thinking about it. Who the fuck does he think he is?
translation.ja: 気にすんな あいつ 何様のつもりだ

translation.en: You know what, leave Ra'Nell out this time, yeah?
translation.ja: 今回はラネルは外そう

translation.en: What, cos of him?
It's more trouble than it's worth. Fuck him.
translation.ja: トラブルの方が多そうだから

translation.en: Come.
Get on this, jump on this bar.
(Sully) We're done. Got shit to do.
- (Dushane grunting) - Come on, man.
(Sully) What you saying?
Yo! You good?
- All right. - (Sully) All right, get in the car, man.
I need to get my dog.
You wanna make money or you wanna take your dog for a walk?
translation.ja: 仕事か 犬の散歩か

translation.en: (Laughs) Exactly. Get in the car.
- No, not you, bro. - What are you talking about?
translation.ja: お前は違う 何言ってんだ

translation.en: You ain't coming.
But Dushane said I should.
Dushane nothing. You got a problem, talk to Leon, yeah?
translation.ja: 何かあればリオンに言え

translation.en: (Sully) Yo.
Stop making so much fucking noise, man.
(Laughing) Only joking, man. Fucking hell, don't you talk?
translation.ja: 冗談だよ くそったれ 何とか言え

translation.en: (Chantelle) He's all right, man.
(Sully) Chantelle, tell him I'm only joking.
(Tareek) Gem, you ever been country before?
I went once to Hampshire with my nan.
(Tareek) A country shop with your nan or something.
(Sully) He did not just say that.
(Sully) Nah, nah, nah, that's not the kinda country he's talking about.
translation.ja: そういう意味じゃない

translation.en: Hey, listen, Gem, this is a whole 'nother country, you know.
It's not that place you been before, trust me.
translation.ja: きっと行ったことないぞ

translation.en: He was talking about his fucking nan.
You OK?
(Boy) Burst his brain, bruv.
Head popped. Pop him.
This is shit, man. You can't even fucking play.
translation.ja: こんなの つまんねえ

translation.en: This thing's hard, bruv. You get sore thumbs.
(Chatter)
Good?
(Dris) Now you lot listen, yeah? This is Robert, my best fiend.
translation.ja: これはロバート　マブダチだ

translation.en: Hey, wake up, man, what's wrong with you? Gazing on the game, man.
You get me? He's gonna let everyone know we're here, you get me?
translation.ja: みんなに知らせる係だ

translation.en: Get the line banging. Ain't that right, Robert?
translation.ja: ドタバタと だろ ロバート？

translation.en: Yeah? Yeah? Go sit over there or something, man.
translation.ja: なあ？ あっちに座ってろ この野郎

translation.en: Fuck, man.
translation.ja: あっちに座ってろ この野郎

translation.en: Make sure you bring my lighter back as well.
(Chantelle) Nice to meet you, fam. Fuck, say something.
translation.ja: よろしく 何か言え

translation.en: This place is dirty.
- I got that, fam. - (Boy) Well done, bruv.
Listen, man's gonna blitz this place quick, you get me?
In and out, yeah? Before the feds even know man's here.
translation.ja: サツに ここがバレる前に

translation.en: What you saying, fam? Yo, come here, let me talk to you.
translation.ja: 何言ってんだ？ 話があるから来い

translation.en: Come, Rob, get up, man. Go in the other room, man. What's wrong with you?
translation.ja: ロバート 部屋を空けろ 何してんだ

translation.en: Sit down there, brother.
Now it's a simple thing, bruv. All you got to remember
translation.ja: 簡単な話だ　覚えろ

translation.en: is make sure you bring me back the right money every time.
translation.ja: ちゃんと売り上げを持ち帰れ

translation.en: You understand? All right? Otherwise it's gonna get political.
translation.ja: でないと ただじゃ済まねえ

translation.en: I don't care if it's even, like, five pound. It don't matter.
You get me? It's the principle, all right?
That five pound there represents respect.
translation.ja: その５ポンドは尊敬の印だ

translation.en: Yeah? We're together. Anyone fucks up, it reflects on everyone, you understand?
translation.ja: 俺たちは仲間だ 誰にもジャマさせねえ

translation.en: All right, man. Now do your thing, man. Go on.
translation.ja: よし　自分の仕事をしてこい

translation.en: (Sully) Come and get this crack here, man. Fuck all this game shit, man.
translation.ja: このクラックを持ってけ

translation.en: (Gem) But I just don't get it.
Bruv, look, what you have to do, yeah, is practise with your tongue, innit.
Get it all agile. Look, see. Drop to the back like this.
translation.ja: さっと奥の方に入れるの

translation.en: See? Under your tongue like this. Can you see?
translation.ja: 舌の下にね　分かる？

translation.en: Does it look like I'm holding anything?
See, because I've got five on this side, got seven on this side here.
translation.ja: こっちに５個入れてて こっち側は７個

translation.en: If the feds try to stop me, they ain't gonna clock shit in my mouth.
translation.ja: 口の中は見つからない

translation.en: Cos it's all the way back there. See that?
translation.ja: ずっと奥の方だから 分かる？　じゃあいい？

translation.en: - Mm. - All right, look.
translation.ja: 分かる？　じゃあいい？

translation.en: Go on, try it.
At the back, under your tongue. Way back.
translation.ja: 舌の下よ　うんと後ろの方へ

translation.en: That's it, yeah, go on. Way down at the back.
- (Coughing) - Shit, what the... Bruv, don't swallow it, bro.
translation.ja: バカね 飲み込んじゃったらダメ

translation.en: Couple of score bags.
Oi, what's this street called? Just in case I get lost.
translation.ja: 帰りに迷うかも ここは何て通り？

translation.en: Andrews Road, blood.
There you go, I've done your laundry for you.
What did you say to Dushane and them? You had no right.
translation.ja: ダシェンに何て言った？

translation.en: What was the deal? You can stay here as long as you behave yourself.
translation.ja: 約束は？ “ちゃんとする”と

translation.en: Hanging with Dushane and Sully and them, that ain't behaving yourself.
You're a hypocrite. You were on the roads with my dad, right?
translation.ja: 自分だってパパと悪事を

translation.en: You were in jail with him, for fuck's sake.
I see you talking to Dushane and Sully and them again, I'm calling social services and I'm telling them you're here on your own.
translation.ja: 連中といたら“１人でいる” と福祉課に言う

translation.en: What? You'd hurt my mum like that?
Don't you think it would hurt her more, you hanging with them?
(Sobbing) Oh, God, no.
Hey, love. Er, just one. Can I have some?
translation.ja: 何が要る？ 少し　何個かくれる？

translation.en: - Those OK? - (Chantelle) They're good.
Enjoy yourself.
Bruv, kill him. Kill him, otherwise he'll come after you again. Seriously.
translation.ja: ヤツを殺せ でなきゃ俺は降りる

translation.en: Yeah, fam, what was you looking?
All right, just wait in the same place, yeah?
Mm. Yo. Three on two.
Yo! Yo, fam, come on, man. Three on two for me now, yeah?
translation.ja: おい　おい起きるんだよ ３の２　同じ場所だ 行ってこい

translation.en: Same place, yeah?
translation.ja: ３の２　同じ場所だ 行ってこい

translation.en: Shit.
- Yo. - (Man) Yo, have you got six on two?
- What you want? - Six on two.
- All right, cool. Where you at? - I'm outside.
translation.ja: あるよ　どこ？ 外だ

translation.en: What the fuck? What you doing outside, bruv?
Yo!
What the fuck they doing coming to the house?
I don't know. They're outside, bruv.
translation.ja: さあね 外にいると

translation.en: Go and sort them out. Tell them not to fucking ever come back again.
translation.ja: 片付けろ 二度と来るなと

translation.en: Bruv, don't fucking come back to the house, you hear me, yeah?
(Sully) Don't fucking listen. How many times I gotta tell you this?
Bruv, I don't...
Oi, you idiot,
don't fucking come round our house again or I smack you up, bruv.
- Where's my money? - Open the fucking gate!
- Fuck! - Hurry up. Open the gate. Open the gate. Hurry up. Hurry up.
translation.ja: いいから ここを開けろ さっさとしろ

translation.en: (Man) Run him, run him! Nuke him!
(Men shouting)
Hey, yo, country boy!
- Oh, you, yeah. - Fuck, no. - (Sully) Big man, yeah? - Get the food, man.
Get the fucking food.
translation.ja: フードはどこだ クソが

translation.en: - That's right. - I need it like a fucking bitch.
(Kamale) Get the food.
Fuck, where's the fucking money?
Where's the money, B?
Where's the fucking money?
(Sully) Pick up the money, blood.
Fucking play with money, brother.
(Dushane) You know you better use that right now, you know? Man's coming after you, fam.
I ain't got to do that. Bobby Raikes is gonna do that.
translation.ja: 俺は平気だ ボビーが追うのは―

translation.en: Both of you.
I'll see you later.
- Hey, cuz, let's go. - Pussies! Pussies!
translation.ja: 行くぞ このヘタレが！

translation.en: (Sighs) What the fuck?
Yo, what you doing here?
You know we're fucked now, innit?
You've been robbed twice.
translation.ja: 次回は… ２度もヘマするなんて

translation.en: What you trying to do, make a habit outta this?
translation.ja: 次回は… ２度もヘマするなんて ２度もヘマするなんて

translation.en: Gonna get your money back, all right?
You got three days.
You have to be very, very careful.
We can't tell no one, especially not your mum.
translation.ja: 誰にも ママにも秘密よ

translation.en: I could go to prison for this.
Go inside and smarten yourself up. I got a surprise for you.
translation.ja: 身なりを整えろ サプライズがある

translation.en: (Sully) We got a snake, bruv.
Gem ain't no snake.
No, I'll tell him to pay. No!
(Sully) We mark Shaun like they marked Chris...
translation.ja: ショーンを利用しようぜ

translation.en: Sends man a message.
